meanings.definition: A person who drives a van.
meanings.sent1: The vanmen delivered packages to our house.
meanings.sent2: The vanmen parked the vehicle in front of the building.
meanings.sent3: The vanmen joked about racing their vans around the city.
meanings.sent4: The vanmen were the unsung heroes of the delivery industry.
meanings.sent5: I always wave to the vanmen when they pass by.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of vanmen unloading goods from their vans.
meanings.sent2: The vanmen were busy organizing their schedules for the day.
meanings.sent3: The vanmen gathered for a group photo before starting their routes.
meanings.sent4: The vanmen worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The vanmen waved cheerfully as they drove off into the sunset.
